status.description: Status code indicating the result of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

result.description: List of dual staking grades with stake rates and percentages.

stakeRate.description: The stake rate for the dual staking grade.

percentage.description: The percentage associated with the stake rate.

400.description: An error occurred while retrieving the dual staking grade.

status.description: Status code of the error response.
